siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Elections Watch - Parsing Social Media Data on the 2019 Nigerian Elections
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: Applying data analytics, machine learning and visualization techniques in understanding key events associated with the 2019 Nigerian elections, citizen engagement, candidate use of social media, and geo political stuctures.
siteMetadata.author: Victor Dibia
siteMetadata.keywords: social science, machine learning, deep learning, visualization, research, design
